refnamediv.refpurpose: Search for records in a LDB database

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ldbsearch searches a LDB database for records matching the specified expression (see the ldapsearch(1) manpage for a description of the expression format). For each record, the specified attributes are printed.

listitem.para: LDB URL to connect to. See ldb(7) for details.
Search scope to use. One-level, subtree or base.
LDB URL to connect to (can be overrided by using the -H command-line option.)
